Digital Project Manager - Pension's experience
My client are looking for a Digital Delivery/Project Manager to work on a 3 month initial remote contract with some ad hoc travel.
Key Skills
Delivery of Internal web application/solution to provide:
Account Management, Contact Management and Case Management for Pensions administrators
Knowledge Base, Interactions Management and Marketing for Digital Engagement Team
Delivery of Member Mobile App:
Uses the functionality/core journeys from broader Digital Product deliveries as a basis for a broader roll out across Pensions
Pensions experience is highly desirable
Delivery of Contact Centre specific workstreams which will integrate AWS (Contact solution) with MS dynamics product suite including:
Telephony: Core capability for telephony configured for client specific deliveries
Chat/Chatbot: Core Chatbot and Webchat (agent assist) capability for voice configured for client specific deliveries
WFM: Workforce management for contact centre
